name: Heart Flop
description:
Rosie lived a tough life...

But that's all over now. Rosie will gymnastically flop across the netherworld to discover and destroy the parts of her that keep her from finding a new purpose in the after life!

**This game is controlled with Gamepad only**

Controls:

Left stick: Move character/cursor

A Button: Attack/Confirm

B Button: Jump

Start Button: Pause
